bio: Born and raised in a Catholic family in rural Texas, John moved to Silicon Valley to pursue his dream of working in the tech industry. An avid reader and a fitness enthusiast, he spends his free time either buried in a book or at the gym. His life goal is to start his own tech company and make a positive impact on society. He strongly believes in the values of hard work and perseverance.
visual_description: John is 6 feet tall with an athletic body type. He sports a clean-shaven look and prefers casual attire, often seen in a pair of jeans and a t-shirt.
